column4: I'm running gutsy, with an integrated intel 965 video adapter. I know the mode is supported, but I can't get xorg to allow me to use 1280x720
open the xorg.conf file and manualy add the resolution you want to every color depts,  save and restart X
& debCarlos: So if I've done that, and it still doesn't show up as an option after I restart X? :)
